original_text: Love never ends. As for prophecies, they will pass away; as for tongues, they will cease; as for knowledge, it will pass away.
korean_text: 사랑은 언제까지나 떨어지지 아니하되 예언도 폐하고 방언도 그치고 지식도 폐하리라

sentences.original_text: As for prophecies, they will pass away
as for tongues, they will cease
as for knowledge, it will pass away.
